devdoc.details: A registrar controller for registering and renewing names at fixed cost.

params.charAmount: The amount in USD/sec. (with 18 digits of precision)  for a character count, e.g. amount for three characters.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

params._allow: A bool indicating if the name is allowed to be listed.
params._name: The name in DNS format, e.g. vitalik.eth

params.name: The full name, in DNS format wherein the length precedes each label and is terminted with a 0x0 byte, e.g. "cb.id" => [0x02,0x63,0x62,0x02,0x69,0x64,0x00].

returns._0: The length of the last character length that was set.

params.charLength: The character length, e.g. 3 would be for three characters. Use 0 for the default amount.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

params.name: The full name, in DNS format wherein the length precedes each label and is terminted with a 0x0 byte, e.g. "cb.id" => [0x02,0x63,0x62,0x02,0x69,0x64,0x00].
params.owner: The address that will own the name.
params.secret: The secret to be used for the commitment.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recoverFunds(address,address,uint256).details: The contract is Ownable and only the owner can call the recover function.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to recover.
params._to: The address to send the tokens to.
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to recover

params.duration: The duration in seconds of the registration.
params.fuses: The fuses to be set on the name.
params.name: The full name, in DNS format.
params.owner: The address that will own the name.
params.referrer: The address that referred the owner to the registrar.
params.resolver: The address of the resolver to use.
params.secret: The secret to be used for the commitment.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.duration: The amount of time the name will be rented for/extended in years.
params.name: The name in DNS format, e.g. vault.vitalik.eth

returns.usdPrice: The rent price for the duration in USD
returns.weiPrice: The rent price for the duration in Wei

params._offerSubnames: A bool indicating the parent name owner is offering subnames.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

params._ownerCut: The cut for the owner of the contract.

params._maxChars: The maximum length a name can be.
params._maxRegistrationDuration: The maximum duration a name can be registered for.
params._minChars: The minimum length a name can be.
params._minRegistrationDuration: The minimum duration a name can be registered for.
params._offerSubnames: A bool indicating the parent name owner is offering subnames.
params._renewalController: The address of the renewal controller.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

params._charAmounts: An array of amounst for each characer length.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

params._referrerCut: The percentage cut given to the referrer (0-10%).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.charAmount: The amount in USD/year for a character count, e.g. amount for three characters.
params.charLength: The character length, e.g. 3 would be for three characters. Use 0 for the default amount.
params.parentNode: The namehash of the parent name.

addNextPriceForCharLength(bytes32,uint25.notice: Adds a price for the next character length, e.g. three characters.

allowName(bytes,bool).notice: Add a name to the allow list.

available(bytes).notice: Check to see if the name is available for registration.

getLastCharIndex(bytes32).notice: Get the last length for a character length that has a price (can be 0), e.g. three characters.

getPriceDataForLength(bytes32,uint16).notice: Get the price for a single character length, e.g. three characters.

makeCommitment(bytes,address,bytes32).notice: Check to see if the name is available for registration.

recoverFunds(address,address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens sent to the contract by mistake.

rentPrice(bytes,uint256).notice: Gets the total cost of rent in wei, from the unitPrice, i.e. USD, and duration.

setOfferSubnames(bytes32,bool).notice: Allows for chaning the offer status of subnames to true or false.

setOwnerCut(uint256).notice: A function to set the cut for the owner of the contract.

setParams(bytes32,bool,address,uint64,ui.notice: Set the pricing for subnames of the parent name.

setPricingForAllLengths(bytes32,uint256[.notice: Set the pricing for subname lengths.

setReferrerCut(uint256).notice: A function to set the referrer cut percentage for a specific referrer.

updatePriceForCharLength(bytes32,uint16,.notice: Set a price for a single character length, e.g. three characters.

withdraw().notice: A function to allow referrers, name owners, or the contract owner to withdraw.
